Package ohos.miscservices.wallpaper

Class WallpaperColorsCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.miscservices.wallpaper.WallpaperColorsCollection

  • public class WallpaperColorsCollection
extends Object
    Provides dominant colors of the wallpaper.

    The colors are obtained in descending order of their dominance. You can use WallpaperColorsCollection#count() to obtain the number of the dominant colors.

    Since:
    3

      • next

        public RgbColor next​()
        Obtains the next dominant color of the wallpaper.
        Returns:
        Returns the dominant color.
        Since:

      • count

        public int count​()
        Obtains the number of dominant colors.
        Returns:

        Since:

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext​()
        Checks whether there are other dominant colors.
        Returns:
        Returns true if there are other dominant colors; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getNthRepresentativeColor

        public RgbColor getNthRepresentativeColor​(int nth)
        Obtains the dominant color at the specified index. If you set nth to 0, the primary dominant color will be returned.
        Parameters:
        nth - Indicates the index of the dominant color to obtain. The value is an integer starting from 0.
        Returns:
        Returns the dominant color if obtained; returns null if nth >= WallpaperColorsCollection#count().
        Since:
        3
